Exercise 1

var myString = "David";
var myNumber = 8;
var myBoolean = false;


// Do not edit the code under this line
console.log("Name: " + myString);
console.log("Lucky Number: " + myNumber);
console.log("Good joke? " + myBoolean);

Exercise 2

console.log('pepperoni','ham');

Exercise 3

console.log(18+3.5)
console.log(2016-1969)
console.log(65/240)
console.log(0.270833*100)
